Tutorial¶

Lorem ipsum.

Find dependencies with ´correlate´¶

>>> from tsar import correlate
>>> print 3
3

Find structures in time series with ´decompose´¶

>>> from tsar import decompose

Find hidden determinism with ´chaos´¶

>>> from tsar import chaos
